text: The 1915 Asmara earthquake took place outside Asmara, Eritrea on September 23 with an of 6.2 and a maximum perceived intensity of VI (Strong) on the Mercalli intensity scale. ==Effects== The event caused panic among the inhabitants and minor damage. The earthquake is described by experts as being of relatively large magnitude. ==See also== * List of earthquakes in 1915 * List of earthquakes in Eritrea ==References== ==External links== * 1915 Asmara Category:1915 earthquakes
title: 1915 Asmara earthquake
